3. Steamed Rice, half a cup, contributes 112 calories, as indicated in the list.
4. Green Beans, one cup, account for 31 calories, as shown beside their serving size.
5. One Whole Wheat Roll adds 83 calories, Pineapple (half a cup) adds 48, and one medium Baked Potato adds 145, all listed with their respective calorie counts.

<final>883 calories</final>
